setup_script_description: sets focus on a link before the Combobox, and sets the combobox value to 'Alabama'
task: navigate forwards to filled in collapsed combobox
specific_user_instruction: Navigate to the Combobox. Note: it should be in the collapsed state.
output_assertions: Name of the combobox ('State') is conveyed
State of the combobox (collapsed) is conveyed
Text of the selected option ('Alabama') is conveyed
The ability to enter or edit text is conveyed
State of the text in the input (selected) is conveyed
The presence of autocomplete behavior is conveyed
